item.title: How to fix this Error (renamed From Error)
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

[quote=“vipersniper100, post:11, topic:148157”]28 Error’s

client.java:22653: illegal start of expression [AttackingOn].absY ^ client.java:22656: illegal start of expression [AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; ^ client.java:22659: illegal start of expression [playerHitpoints]; ^ client.java:22664: ')' expected if (PlayerHandler.players; ^ client.java:22666: illegal start of expressiond help me with that tutorial? [AttackingOn].playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2570) { ^ client.java:22676: not a statement server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY); ^ client.java:22676: ';' expected server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY); ^ client.java:22679: illegal start of type if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) // rune scimi here ^ client.java:22747: <identifier> expected boolean UseBow = false; ^ client.java:22748: illegal start of type if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214) ^ client.java:22894: <identifier> expected return false; ^ client.java:22896: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean ResetAttack() { ^ client.java:22905: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int otherpkps = 0; ^ client.java:22906: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int otherkillc = 0; ^ client.java:22908: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void PKz() { ^ client.java:23079: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItem2 = 0; ^ client.java:23080: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItem3 = 0; ^ client.java:23081: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItemAmount = 0; ^ client.java:23082: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItemAmount2 = 0; ^ client.java:23083: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItemAmount3 = 0; ^ client.java:23085: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void resetKeepItem() { ^ client.java:25304: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int Publicchat = 0; ^ client.java:25306: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void pmstatus(int status) { //status: loading = 0 connecting = 1 fine = 2 ^ client.java:25380: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void AttackMage(int index) ^ client.java:27679: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean healing() { ^ client.java:29754: 'class' or 'interface' expected public PlayerSave loadMythgame(String playerName, String playerP ass) ^ client.java:31637: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ client.java:31637: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ 28 errors Press any key to continue . . .
here is the code before i added int offsetX = (absX - EnemyX) * -1;
int offsetY = (absY - EnemyY) * -1;

[code] public boolean Attack() {
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int EnemyHP = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
int EnemyHPExp = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerXP[playerHitpoints];
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
boolean RingOfLife = false;
if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2570) {
RingOfLife = true;
}
int hitDiff = 0;
int wepdelay = 0;
CalculateMaxHit();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

//viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY)[/code]
Didnt give eny error’s
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,201039.0.html tut i was following
when u get back can you add it for me?
o and my thing doesnt say

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11785) { PkingDelay = 5; UseBow = true; }
it says if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11785) { PkingDelay = 0; wepdelay = 0; UseBow = true; }[/quote]

hmm soz but i hope you made a backup of oyur client .java

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @vipersniper100 vipersniper100
item.description:
@vipersniper100 wrote:

28 Error’s

client.java:22653: illegal start of expression [AttackingOn].absY ^ client.java:22656: illegal start of expression [AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; ^ client.java:22659: illegal start of expression [playerHitpoints]; ^ client.java:22664: ')' expected if (PlayerHandler.players; ^ client.java:22666: illegal start of expressiond help me with that tutorial? [AttackingOn].playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2570) { ^ client.java:22676: not a statement server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY); ^ client.java:22676: ';' expected server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY); ^ client.java:22679: illegal start of type if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) // rune scimi here ^ client.java:22747: <identifier> expected boolean UseBow = false; ^ client.java:22748: illegal start of type if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214) ^ client.java:22894: <identifier> expected return false; ^ client.java:22896: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean ResetAttack() { ^ client.java:22905: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int otherpkps = 0; ^ client.java:22906: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int otherkillc = 0; ^ client.java:22908: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void PKz() { ^ client.java:23079: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItem2 = 0; ^ client.java:23080: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItem3 = 0; ^ client.java:23081: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItemAmount = 0; ^ client.java:23082: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItemAmount2 = 0; ^ client.java:23083: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int keepItemAmount3 = 0; ^ client.java:23085: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void resetKeepItem() { ^ client.java:25304: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int Publicchat = 0; ^ client.java:25306: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void pmstatus(int status) { //status: loading = 0 connecting = 1 fine = 2 ^ client.java:25380: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void AttackMage(int index) ^ client.java:27679: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean healing() { ^ client.java:29754: 'class' or 'interface' expected public PlayerSave loadMythgame(String playerName, String playerP ass) ^ client.java:31637: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ client.java:31637: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ 28 errors Press any key to continue . . .
here is the code before i added int offsetX = (absX - EnemyX) * -1;
int offsetY = (absY - EnemyY) * -1;

[code] public boolean Attack() {
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int EnemyHP = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
int EnemyHPExp = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerXP[playerHitpoints];
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
boolean RingOfLife = false;
if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2570) {
RingOfLife = true;
}
int hitDiff = 0;
int wepdelay = 0;
CalculateMaxHit();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

//viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY)[/code]
Didnt give eny error’s
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,201039.0.html tut i was following
when u get back can you add it for me?
o and my thing doesnt say

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11785) { PkingDelay = 5; UseBow = true; }
it says if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11785) { PkingDelay = 0; wepdelay = 0; UseBow = true; }

item.title: How to fix this Error (renamed From Error)
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

try this

[code]public boolean Attack() {
int offsetX = (absX - EnemyX) * -1;
int offsetY = (absY - EnemyY) * -1;
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players;

[AttackingOn].absY
int EnemyHP = PlayerHandler.players;

[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
int EnemyHPExp = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerXP;

[playerHitpoints];
client AttackingOn2 = (client)

server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
boolean RingOfLife = false;
if (PlayerHandler.players;

[AttackingOn].playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2570) {
RingOfLife = true;
}
int hitDiff = 0;
int wepdelay = 0;
CalculateMaxHit();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

//viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX,

server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY);
}[/code]

that should work i gtg take a shower ill see if errors after i get done k ttyl

Read full topic

That means its found an error in,

client.java:22652: ';' expected
                     int EnemyHP = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[pla
yerHitpoints];
                     ^

That part or Client.java, I don’t no how to fix it but post a topic on it titled

How to fix this error, And see if u get replies or had problems compiling.
